alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 5:04PM EDT until September 04 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt and Magoffin. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Excessive runoff will cause minor flooding of creeks and streams, roads, and roadside culverts. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Salyersville, Mason, Lakesville, Hendricks, Gifford, Stringtown, Carver Station, Perlie, Cyrus, Tiptop, and Tella.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
